title: Connected problem on turkey Ocennia Ping
body: I connected ocennia in turkey but Im only 385 ping all game pls transered my accounted turkey Ä± havent got a money and I useless all round , leave match pls help me riot, pls transered my accounted turkey

replies.body: You do have quite a physical distance, so you may see high ping.  You can try running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection, but it can't exceed that physical distance.  Transfers are also available through the client store too, under the account section.  I hope that helps!
